content:
Hello
I am trying to create new app with FHIR standard
I am using (nodejs, reactjs, mongoDB)
Could you help me,plz?

Help you how? What have you tried? What problems are you having? You might start by taking a look at this: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Rules+for+Asking+Questions. Following them will help us help you :)
For Nodejs and Mongo specific FHIR implementation this project might be a good starting point - https://github.com/Asymmetrik/node-fhir-server-mongo
I think @Abbie Watson could also point you to some Node resources for FHIR.
I just found the link that @Abbie Watson would probably point you to: https://github.com/symptomatic/node-on-fhir

Chris Moesel said:

I think Abbie Watson could also point you to some Node resources for FHIR.

Yup! Uses the Meteor build pipeline, but it's all Node.js, React, and MongoDB under the hood. I'm currently going through quarterly maintenance, and bringing it back under quality control. Hoping to get it passing Circle CI by the end of the week, and then doing another round of testing against Aegis and Inferno.
